enWisdom: Vain desires are passions of youth
Vain desire is an obeyed enemy
Vain desire is a [cause of one’s] fall to the lowest of the low
Vain desire is the greater of the two enemies
Vain desire is a worshipped deity

Wisdom: امْلِكْ عَلَيْكَ [غَلِيلَ‏] هَوَاكَ وَشَجَى نَفْسِكَ فَإِنَّ شَجَى النَّفْسِ الْإِنْصَافُ مِنْهَا فِيمَا أَحَبَّتْ وَكَرِهَتْ
enWisdom: Take control over your vain desires and the distress of your soul, for indeed the distress of the soul lies in acting equitably in [both] the things which it loves and [in those which it] hates

Wisdom: أَلَا وَإِنَّ أَخْوَفَ مَا أَخَافُ عَلَيْكُمُ اتِّبَاعُ الْهَوَى وَطُولُ الْأَمَلِ
enWisdom: Indeed, the thing I fear most for you is [the result of your] following vain desires and having lengthy aspirations
The most destructive thing is vain desire

Wisdom: سَلُوا اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ الْعَافِيَةَ مِنْ تَسْوِيلِ الْهَوَى وَفِتَنِ الدُّنْيَا
enWisdom: Ask Allah for welfare [and safety] from the lustful temptations and the trials of this world
The delusions of vain desire beguile

Wisdom: كَيْفَ يَسْتَطِيعُ الْإِخْلَاصَ مَنْ يَغْلِبُهُ الْهَوَى
enWisdom: How can one be capable of sincerity when he has been overcome by vain desire?
Do not let your vain desires overpower you
Do not be a slave to vain desires and coveted objects
There is no enemy like vain desire
There is no damage [and loss] greater than [what is brought about by] vain desire
